name: Color Course
description:
A fun puzzle game where you must guide a beam of color to the goal.  Over 100 awesome color filled levels!

This game was super fun to make, and my first push to finish something and put it out there.  Hopefully  I've squashed all the bugs and annoying issue, but if you happen to find anything, or just want to give some feedback you can use this form. 

Comments and feedback are greatly welcome :)
